abstract: Speaking to students at the University of Oxford, the former Microsoft chief executive tempered his usual theatrics with a discussion of what Microsoft did right and wrong during his tenure.
snippet: Speaking to students at the University of Oxford, the former Microsoft chief executive tempered his usual theatrics with a discussion of what Microsoft did right and wrong during his tenure.
lead_paragraph: OXFORD, England –- A month after stepping down as Microsoft’s chief executive, Steven A. Ballmer hasn’t lost any of his energy.

headline.main: Steven Ballmer Reflects on Missteps and Ponders the Future of Microsoft
headline.print_headline: Ballmer Ponders the Missteps at Microsoft
